publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-406 Hugh O’Donnell: Scottish Archaeology Month—That the Parliament congratulates the Council for Scottish Archaeology for co-ordinating Scottish Archaeology Month; notes that it has arranged almost 200 events to take place throughout Scotland; recognises the importance of celebrating archaeology in Scotland; supports the innovative and dynamic way that the Council for Scottish Archaeology has empowered local communities by initiating the Adopt-a-Monument scheme and notes that this is the first year that some Adopt-a-Monument groups will showcase their work; considers that greater support should be given to the Council for Scottish Archaeology, and wishes all those involved in the running of Scottish Archaeology Month the best of success for the event.

S3M-406 Scottish Archaeology Month (lodged on 3 September 2007) John Lamont*, Bashir Ahmad*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Patrick Harvie*, Sandra White*, Mike Rumbles*, Stuart McMillan*, Alison McInnes*, Bob Doris*, Mike Pringle*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alex Johnstone*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Kidd*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh Henry*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jim Hume*, Karen Gillon*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Wilson*, Jamie Stone*, Elaine Smith*, Patricia Ferguson*, Tavish Scott*

S3M-406 Hugh O’Donnell: Scottish Archaeology Month—That the Parliament congratulates the Council for Scottish Archaeology for co-ordinating Scottish Archaeology Month; notes that it has arranged almost 200 events to take place throughout Scotland; recognises the importance of celebrating archaeology in Scotland; supports the innovative and dynamic way that the Council for Scottish Archaeology has empowered local communities by initiating the Adopt-a-Monument scheme and notes that this is the first year that some Adopt-a-Monument groups will showcase their work; considers that greater support should be given to the Council for Scottish Archaeology, and wishes all those involved in the running of Scottish Archaeology Month the best of success for the event. Supported by: John Lamont, Bashir Ahmad, Roseanna Cunningham, Patrick Harvie, Sandra White, Mike Rumbles, Stuart McMillan, Alison McInnes, Bob Doris, Mike Pringle, Kenneth Gibson, Alex Johnstone, Nanette Milne, Elizabeth Smith, Ross Finnie, Bill Kidd, Liam McArthur, Hugh Henry, Rob Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Jim Hume, Karen Gillon, Ken Macintosh, Bill Wilson, Jamie Stone, Elaine Smith, Patricia Ferguson, Tavish Scott, Robin Harper*
S3M-406 Scottish Archaeology Month (lodged on 3 September 2007) John Farquhar Munro*
S3M-406 Scottish Archaeology Month (lodged on 3 September 2007) Cathy Peattie* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
